name: Project Timeslip
description:
Project Timeslip is a short point & click puzzle game created for the October 2020 UOW Sem Game Jam.

In Project Timeslip, you awake trapped in a living room with no memory of how you got there. Using the telephone in the middle of the room, you quickly realized that you can somehow slip into a different time of the room you are in.

Utilizing only this tool available to you, you must figure out the answer to the keypad locking the door and leave the room.

Credits:

Tan Xinyi - Design & Art

Chua Rock Yee - Programming

Joshua Lee - Design
